Discover top scholarships from around the world to fund your education abroad

EADA Business School Barcelona Scholarships 2025 Spain

EADA's scholarship programs are designed to attract talented individuals from around the world to its Master's programs. Scholarships are awarded based on various criteria, including academic excellence, leadership potential, and commitment to diversity and innovation

Spain
Deadline: May 2025
View Details
Scholarship
Fully FundedDevelopment+1
€6,600 annually

University of Palermo Scholarships 2025-2026

The University of Palermo, in collaboration with ERSU (Regional Agency for the Right to Education), provides comprehensive financial support to international students. The scholarship package includes full tuition fee exemption, free accommodation from October to July, complimentary meals at university canteens, and a stipend for personal expenses. Applications are open until July 30, 2025, for master’s programs and August 9, 2025, for bachelor’s programs. This initiative fosters academic excellence and cultural exchange within the university community.

Italy
Deadline: August 9, 2025
View Details
Scholarship
Merit BasedDevelopment+2
Grand Prize: $10,000

MPOWER Global Citizen Scholarship 2025

This scholarship offers financial assistance to international students enrolled in U.S. institutions supported by MPOWER. It is open to students across all fields of study and does not require co-signers or collateral.

United States
Deadline: July 31, 2025
View Details
Scholarship
Fully funded
€992 to €1,300

DAAD Scholarship Programs 2025

Germany is one of the top study destinations for international students, known for its world-class education and low or no tuition fees. To make studying more affordable, various scholarships are available in 2025 for international students at all academic levels—bachelor’s, master’s, and PhD. These scholarships are offered by the German government, universities, and private organizations. Some of the most popular scholarships include the DAAD Scholarship, Erasmus+, Heinrich Böll Foundation Scholarship, and university-specific programs. These awards often cover tuition, living expenses, travel costs, and health insurance. Applicants are usually selected based on academic merit, motivation, and sometimes financial need.

germany
Deadline: August to October
View Details
Scholarship
Fully FundedDevelopment+2
Full tuition + living expenses

Australia Awards Scholarships

Australia Awards Scholarships are long-term development awards administered by the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade. They aim to contribute to the development needs of Australia's partner countries.

Australia
Deadline: April 30, 2026
View Details
